name: Pushbullet dark
description: started with style 141771 and tweaked it to add back a little color
additional_info:
v1.0.1
- fixed Pushbullet buttons shown on other sites
v1.0.0
- changed background from black to dark grey
- slightly lighter font
- made links in settings 'Pushbullet green' rather than the regular font color
- added more color in a couple places
- made buttons and textboxes have rounded corners
